import React from 'react'; import './Business.css' class Bussines extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props) } render(){ const business = this.props.business return(

{business.name}

{business.address}

{business.city}

{business.state} {business.zipCode}

{business.category}

{business.rating} stars

{business.reviewCount} reviews

) } } export default Bussines
